tooltipText: <p1>Provide some context on what the app does so that the AI can make better translations.</p1><p2>If there are any specific words or phrases that you DON'T want translated, this is a good place to mention that.</p2>
descriptionHelpAI: The description of the project will be used to help AI make better translations.
mentionKeywords: Mention things like what your app does, what industry it's in and any relevant keywords which should be preserved in translations.
addDirectoryPlaceholder: Add a directory of source files like src or scripts
connectRepoToGetStarted: Connect a GitHub repository to get started
